subject: Golf
British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Victories in major tournaments by three different golfers from Northern Ireland in the past 13 months have heightened interest in the region, especially the seaside town of Portrush, home to Darren Clarke and Graeme McDowell.
snippet: Victories in major tournaments by three different golfers from Northern Ireland in the past 13 months have heightened interest in the region, especially the seaside town of Portrush, home to Darren Clarke and Graeme McDowell.
